name: Exchange extension
description: Allows your users to enter market orders and exchange cryptocurrencies.

name: Airdrop extension
description: Distribute coins to your users by performing airdrops.

name: ShapeShift Exchange extension
description: Lets your users exchange cryptocurrencies using ShapeShift.io from within your website.

name: Events Manager Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway
description: Let logged in users pay for tickets in Events Manager Pro from their cryptocurrency wallet.

name: Faucet Extension
description: Reward your users for solving CAPTCHAs.

name: Tip the Author
description: Allows users with cryptocurrency wallets to tip content authors.

name: WooCommerce Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway
description: Let logged in users pay at WooCommerce checkout from their cryptocurrency wallet.
